Although it works well after the Bluetooth connects, it can sometimes take a minute or so to connect with my Asus C302C Chromebook; other times it connects immediately. I don't really understand why. I think 4-1/2 stars is the right rating for this one. The connection issue is mildly irritating, but not a showstopper. I do recommend this mouse.

description: 7 Colorful LED breathing light change alternately, soothing light lights up the mouse in dark, adds more fun to the life. Note: It can't be set to one specific color. How to use it? * Charge the mouse for about 2 hours before using it for the first time. 1. Take the dongle out, which is stored at the bottom of the mouse. 2. Insert the dongle into the USB port of your device, and open the mouse switch (at the bottom of the mouse). 3. Allow a few seconds for installing, no action needed, just wait. Then you can use it. Note: If your computer is Type-C port, please insert the USB-C to USB receiver into the Type-c port of the device first, then insert the USB receiver into the USB-C to USB receiver. Turn on the power switch and the mouse will work. Tips: The mouse cursor will move slowly or stop moving when the mouse is low battery. Please charge it on time. The blue light beside the scroll wheel will be on while charging, and then goes off when the mouse is fully charged.

Please Note: If your laptop just with type-c port, You need connect the supplied USB-C to USB adapter to your laptop and plug the USB receiver in to it.

reviews.title: Nice design
reviews.text: I use this with my netbook to control it across the room. It is smaller than most other mouse. It goes easily in my travel bag. Nice design. I got tired of plain black.

reviews.title: One of the best everyday mice I've used
reviews.text:
I have input devices for drawing on my tablet, and I have a gaming mouse, but the Logitech M305 is an excellent mouse for every day use, so it's the one I use the most.

The mouse itself has very basic features,
* scroll wheel (mild clicking feedback)with side-click options
* battery status light (green when fully charged, red when almost out)
* two buttons
* an off switch
* a nano USB transmitter than stores inside the mouse
* uses a single AA battery

It does come in jazzy designs, and I liked the yellow/gold one the best. The one thing I might have wanted to change on this mouse is the on/off switch. The best nano-USB mouse I've ever had would automatically turn off when you stored the transmitter inside. With this one, be sure to flip the switch to off as well before you put it in your bag, or it will be down there draining the battery as it moves around.

reviews.title: Leadsail is my brand
reviews.text: Leadsail is my go to brand for quality computer mice.  This is the fifth one I have gotten and they all work flawlessly.  This one is slightly more compact in design but their trademark always is an ergonomically satisfying fit in the hand.  I am left handed but use my right hand for the mouse.  I have rather large hands and this mouse is perfect to grip and maneuver.  It also is indeed silent which is not really an issue for me.  What I look for is design, function and durability and you get that with all Leadsail products.  Recommend.

reviews.title: Cheap and useless.
reviews.text: This mouse feels so cheap, it wasn’t even worth giving a review but I wanted to warn others to not get this mouse. It’s so flimsy and made so cheaply, I didn’t waste anymore time with it so I am returning.

reviews.title: Flawless Bluetooth connectivity with Mac
reviews.text: My Logitech M310 (been using them for 10-15 years) could not connect properly with my USB-C/Thunderbolt MacBookPro, using their USB dongle, thru a USB adapter. Scroll wheel would NOT work, and Logitech tech support said they would not update drivers. 'Don't use an adapter.' But they aren't aware that new Macs don't have old-school USB ports? Anyone else have this problem?! Anyway... this Seenda connects directly with Bluetooth, and connects instantly. If it sleeps (after a few hours?) it wakes and re-connects with one click, in less than a second. I charged the battery when I bought it a few weeks ago, and forgot that I might need to charge it again one day. Still going. Downsides: it is much smaller and lighter than I am used to (the M310 is easily twice as thick/tall) so I am getting used to that. Took awhile to find the right DPI/resolution/speed (and the button to change that is in a precarious, easy-to-hit-by-mistake position. Overall a great recommend.

reviews.title: squeaks when scrolling - not for small hands
reviews.text: Loud clicks, SQUEAKS when scrolling, made for larger hands. You would think since it's pink it wouldn't be designed for a mans hands but here we are. Ultimately, the obnoxious squeaking while scrolling is why I am returning it.

reviews.title: Wired + Wireless?  Work for you? Good multimedia controls & phone slot
reviews.text:
Not a fan of wireless accessories (the batteries typically fail without warning, makers want you to be surprised), I made an exception for this pairing model because the keyboard is wired.

PRO
-Ubiquitous AA battery for mouse
-Economical
-Numeric pad
-Multimedia buttons: Volume knob, buttons for mute, pause, previous, next
-A place to put your phone (nice touch!)

CON
-Neither is backlit
-KB not programmable

NEUTRAL
-Non-'clack-y' key design, these are "quiet"
-Some humans will like pink, not widely available, maybe a good gift
-Con (for me) is the wireless mouse

reviews.title: Fun cordless mouse and keyboard
reviews.text: This is a great little retro cordless keyboard and mouse combo. I ordered it because it has just one dongle that both operate from. That gives me more USB ports available for other things. It works great as long as the keyboard and mouse are close to the laptop or the tower. It lags a bit when it’s in a keyboard drawer. I like the compact and portable nature this setup includes!

reviews.title: pink keyboard and wireless mouse
reviews.text: Love the pink color of this retro keyboard and mouse.  Great that the keyboard is spill proof I can have my coffee and not worry about wrecking my keyboard.  Easily plugged right into my all-in-one computer.  Took me a little while to get used to the punk keycaps, and now I love how quiet and comfortable they are to use.  The mouse fits well in my hand, and the wheel rolls back and forth smoothly. Top 5 stars for this one!

The Llama image is on the mouse solidly, it won't come off, which is ideal.  The mouse was easy to install, took my computer maximum of 1 minute to install the driver and my computer is 7 years old.  The other great thing is it has a 'battery saving' feature that puts the mouse into sleep mode when not in use.  To use it again simply left-click once and your mouse is awake and functioning again.  I use this mouse all day for work and at night for pleasure, haven't replaced the batteries yet!

If I had kids at home I would pass this along for schoolwork, but it isn't adequate for gaming or long stretches of editing.

description: How to connect: Step1:open the battery cover,then install the two AAA battery . Step2:Take out the USB dongle and close the battery cover . Step3:Plug the USB dongle in the USB port . Step4:Place your wireless mouse close to the dongle about 30CM,turn the power switch button to "ON", the led light will light up.Your mouse will connect with the dongle automatically and start working . Notice if the mouse doesn't work ,please place the mouse near to the dongle and press the connect button (underneath the mouse)and release ,it wll connect to work . Package details Wireless mouse x1 USB nano receiver x1

reviews.title: Good Basic Mouse
reviews.text: It serves the purpose intended. A good, basic wired replacement mouse.

reviews.title: Mouse in the house.
reviews.text: Works properly as it should, couldn’t beat the price.

reviews.title: It works great! But not for long!
reviews.text:
Came a day early, put two AAA batteries in, put the USB in the laptop, and away we go.

It works great.

Update: It didn't work for long. It starts out with the mouse going to sleep all on it's own, and then it gets worst (you wouldn't think it possible, would you). I left the laptop and mouse on while I ran to the store, when I came back it was working VERY intermittent (very jerky) so I opened it thinking maybe my batteries weren't all that good.

What did I find? One of the batteries was so hot I couldn't touch it. I'm surprised it didn't catch on fire.

I should have known better than to buy some Chinese garbage. Into the trash it went.

Don't buy this, it's a waste of good money.

features: ✔️ [High Quality] Replacement mouse feet that increases your control and accuracy by providing the smoothest and most consistent slide
✔️ [Buttery Smooth] Having a smoother slide helps reduce grip tension which improves accuracy and decreases wrist strain for longer and more enjoyable gaming or work sessions

reviews.title: Really improve the feel
reviews.text:
Before this I have never really considered changing the mouse feet. The only reason I purchased these was because I need to remove the old ones to solder in a new switch.

With the new micro switches installed. https://amzn.to/3ElgafC ( incase you are curious which ones) and the new feet this made a whole new mouse.

The feet arrived perfect no bends or wrinkles. Super easy to install. Just make sure you clean the area really good with some alcohol.

They glide so much better than stock feet. The feel is simply amazing. Now whenever I purchase a new mouse I will be upgrading the feet. If you are on the fence about it I would say go for it.

For durability I have had these on for over a month and they have no signs of wear. They still perform excellent.

Thank you for taking the time to read this and I hope that it was helpful in your purchase decision

reviews.title: Sucks, Slow, Terrible, Missing pieces.
reviews.text:
Extremely slow unless you know how to disable 50 or so features that run off the bat. The mouse came with no bluetooth adapter, and this doesn't have built in bluetooth.
Seriously don't buy HP.

1 hour of ownership update: It's stopped opening windows. It brings up the login screen, then I get a black screen. The computer no longer works and I've done nothing to it. There are several other reviews referring to this issue.

reviews.title: Five Stars
reviews.text: so far its a great buy. I like it

reviews.title: Excelent value laptop
reviews.text: My daughter needed a faster more copact laptop for her graphics software so we gave this one a try.  Very fast, easy setup...nice and easy to chuck the bloatware.  A reasonable price made it an easy choice...so much so that we purchased another.

reviews.title: Definitely returning and buying a different brand
reviews.text: I had high hopes for this laptop... very very very slow. I mean how can a company like HP in this day in age make a laptop this slow. I didn’t expect speeds you would see in a gaming laptop for this price but I at least want to be able to watch a movie or even start the laptop within 10 minutes, and they don’t even allow you to upgrade the RAM or anything from what I can tell... and the battery life is laughable, like a previous comment said, about 1 percent per minute. I would even go as far as to say that it dies faster than that. Purchased this for my sister for her birthday but will definitely return and go with a different laptop.

title: Logitech Wireless Mouse M325 (Celebration Black)

The micro-precise scrolling and tilt wheel provide you the speed and accuracy you need. Easy-to-use and compatible with all of the main OS, it's ready to work in seconds and lasts up to 18 months without changing batteries. COMFORTABLE SHAPE, COMPACT DESIGN Stay productive longer thanks to the comfortable, contoured shape that follows the natural curve of your hand. Compact and wireless, M325 fits easily with your laptop in a bag-making it great for working on the go and homeschooling. It's also designed for both right- and left-handed users, allowing you to switch the left and right click via Logitech Options Software. FAST SCROLLING, PRECISE TRACKING Our micro-precise scrolling and tilt wheel give you the speed and precision you need to breeze through long pages, websites, links, spreadsheets, and images. Customize the tilt action to perform horizontal scroll, forward/backward, and more through Logitech Options. PLUG & PLAY SIMPLICITY Simply plug the USB receiver into your computer or laptop to start working in seconds and get a strong, reliable connection within up to 10 meters (33 feet),Plus, you can easily pair through the same receiver up to six compatible peripherals using Logitech Unifying™ technology. BROAD COMPATIBILITY M325 is compatible with most OS-Windows®, macOS®, Linux®.And is also a certified Works with Chromebook™product. INCREASED PRODUCTIVITY Get more done by combining M325 with your laptop. According to a recent study, laptop users who chose this mouse over a touchpad were 50% more productive and worked 30% faster. title: LingAo Slim Silent Wireless Mouse,2 Pack with Nano Receiver,3 Adjustable DPI Levels,Slim Silent Wireless Mouse Silent Click for PC, Laptop, Tablet, Computer, and Mac (Black&White)
description: Product Descriptions No matter you are an office clerk or a colleague student, a slim and noiseless wireless mouse is absolutely needed. The mute button design of our LingAo wireless mouse keeps you focused on what you are working on without disturbing others. Noiseless Clicks Sometimes you need to work on the computer while others want to have a rest. At that moment, a noiseless wireless mouse would help, providing credible using experience. Slim and Portable Design Compact and portable, the slim wireless mouse can be easily put into your bag or even pocket. Great for business trips or travelling. Supports Plug and Play Supports plug and play, no other driver is needed. Simply plug the Nano receiver into the computer USB connector and wait until it finishes installing. Power-Saving Mode Auto Power Off (APO) for energy saving. LingAo basic mouse will be switched off automatically when the Nano Receiver is disconnected, or the PC is power off. Specifications:  Product Dimensions: 4.5*2.6*1.3in (115*65.5*33mm)  Product Weight: 2.3oz (63g)  Battery Type: 1*AA Battery (not included)  CPI: 1250-1500-1800 Wireless: Yes System Requirements: Windows XP, Windows 7, Windows Vista, Windows 8, Windows 10, Windows 2000, Mac OS.  Plug and Play Operation: Yes Note:  Nano receiver is stored in the back of the mouse.  Battery lifespan may vary with different user habit and battery capacity.  To ensure a better signal transmission, please confirm that there are no obstacles or electromagnetic wave around the mouse. Package Included:  1 x Wireless Mouse 1 x USB Nano Receiver 1 x User Manual
features: Sensitive and Noiseless: Quiet clicks free your worry about bothering other beside you and keep you focused while working or studying. The optical laser allows for quick response, precise movement and smoother tracking.

Skin-Friendly for Comfort: Streamline design with anti-fingerprint and sweat-resistant finish offers your hand maximum support and comfort. The sturdy anti-slip rubber scroll wheel ensures that your hand will not slip when scrolling.

Portable and Pocket Size: Featuring slim (4.5*2.6*1.3in/115*65*33mm) which is twice thinner than ordinary mice, this portable wireless mouse is perfect for travelling. It can be easily put into your backpack or pocket. (Note: The Nano receiver is stored in the back of the mouse.)

Stable and Anti-Interference: 2.4GHz wireless transmission technology provides a powerful and reliable connection up to 33ft (10m). 3 adjustable CPI levels, 1250-1500-1800, easily change the mouse sensitivity to match your activity.

Energy Saving and warranty: Auto Power Off (APO) for energy saving. LingAo basic mouse will be switched off automatically when the Nano Receiver is disconnected, or the PC is power off. Well compatible with Windows7/8/10/XP, Vista7/8 and Linux etc.Suitable for couples, friends, colleagues, parents, husband and wife. 30 days money-back & 1-year guaranty, any problems, please don't hesitate to get an after-sale service.

reviews.title: you get what you pay for
reviews.text: these work but feel like crap.  Left and right click are terrible.  Sometimes when I left click, as the piece of plastic is coming back up, it goes under the right side.  Its like someone took a solid sheet of plastic and cut a line down the middle to allow you to press down on the left or right side, its terrible.  Scroll wheel feels fine.  DPI button just cycles through, no way to go up or down, just cycles through 3 modes.  Very uncomfortable.  For the price, you get two and both are exactly like this so I doubt its defective.  I only got these to control my streaming PC so its not a HUGE deal, but if youre getting these for daily use - DONT DO IT.  I can hardly put up with these and I use them for maybe 10 mins a day.  Pay 15$ for one mouse.  I honestly feel like I could crush these with my hand - thats how crappy they feel.  They also go to sleep mode after like 5 mins so I have to constantly click it to wake it up, and it ends up opening apps.  Not worth the 15$

title: Neises LED Bluetooth Mouse,Bluetooth Mouse for MacBook Pro/MacBook Air/iMac/mac/ipad/ipad pro,Wireless Mouse for Macboook Air/MacBook Pro/PC (Silver)
description:
✅Packing list: Instructions*1, LED rechargeable Bluetooth5.1 + 2.4G dual-mode mouse *1, 2.4g Nano USB receiver *1(hidden in the slot at the bottom of the mouse), USB charging line *1, USB C-type adapter *1
✅How to connect to a laptop using bluetooth mode:
Turn on the Bluetooth switch at the bottom of the mouse > open the computer system Settings > open Bluetooth >when the computer bluetooth display is looking for nearby bluetooth devices, find the "BT5.1 mouse", click the connection, and then successfully connected, you can use the mouse.
✅ How to connect to iOS/iPad/Pro/Air/ Mini/ Phone (ios 13/ios 14) via Bluetooth Mouse
first slide the button at the bottom of the mouse to the bluetooth " " position. ( bluetooth mode.)
(1) open tabletSettings >Accessibility > Touch > AssistiveTouch > Click to open （An auxiliary dot will appear on the screen）
(2) Go back to Settings > Click on the bluetooth > Click to open > BT 5.1 MOUSE > connect and Pair.（PIN:0000)
🔋How to Charge Wireless Mouse?
🔋When the pointer of your mouse does not move or cannot be used, or suddenly disconnects continuously in use, you need to charge it for about 3 hours. Please use the USB port of your computer to charge it, or use an adapter with an output of no more than 5v to charge it
✅ How to use the 2.4G receiver mode:
Open the 2.4G receiver mode at the bottom of the mouse, remove the USB receiver at the bottom of the mouse,Plug the USB receiver into your computer's USB port and move the mouse to start working，If your laptop is a Type C port, first plug the Type C adapter into your laptop's Type C port, then plug the mouse's USB receiver into the Type C adapter, and then move the mouse to work
💡 7-color LED mouse: After the mouse is successfully connected to your computer/laptop/iPad device, the 7-color LED starts to light one by one.
features: ERGONOMIC DESIGN： Good surface coating technology given you a skin-like touch feeling. User-friendly design provide all-day comfort for work and entertainment, portable and pocket-sized perfect for travel, Mute design keeps away annoying clicks.

Use the DPI mouse button on the screen: you are free to adjust the mouse sensitivity to match your activity. Provide 3 DPI levels (800-1200-1600). The higher the DPI, the faster the cursor moves on the screen
For all computers and laptops and ios13 / ios14 tablet/pro/Air / Phone / MAC / MacBook / Pro / air windows / chromebook / HP / Dell
💡 7-color LED mouse: After the mouse is successfully connected to your computer/laptop/iPad device, the 7-color LED starts to light one by one.
BUILT-IN BATTERY: Built-in battery,easy to charge by micro usb cable,no more need for extra AAA battery.

title: LZYDD Mouse Anti-Slip Tape Elastics Refined Side Grips Sweat Resistant Pads / Anti Sweat Paste for Logitech G Pro Wireless Mouse
description: Anti-Slip tape Elastics Refined Side Grips Sweat resistant pads / anti sweat paste for Logitech G pro wireless mouse
features: Come with 1 set including 4 parts ( 2 top parts and 2 side parts)
Only Anti-Slip tape included, No mouse included

reviews.title: Amazing addition to the Logitech G Pro Wireless!
reviews.text: Great quality, precision cut pieces that fit EXACTLY in the shape of the mouse. Whoever designed the CAD for this did a great job on the measurements. Using the grip itself, also crazy how something so small makes a big difference. No more worrying about it slipping off my right thumb which I mentally couldn't handle. It's shame that Logitech didn't design the grip but this will do nicely until they do.

reviews.title: They're ok.
reviews.text:
I'm only using the side grips. (No issue with the texture of the buttons, so imo, its best to just not use them and keep the mouse as light as possible)

Its definitely an improvement over the stock plastic feel, which is too smooth for me. These add some grip, and even a bit of cushion.

Guess I was expecting a more grippy feeling. Maybe a more pronounced texture. There is definitely room for improvement for those of us with sweaty gaming hands.

I also wish the edges were tapered off at its edges rather than a hard cut, but that's a minor nitpick and not too important.

I will say with these grips, I am having trouble deciding between which mouse to use primarily... G Pro Wireless or Viper Ultimate. This is definitely something that was missing from the G Pro Wireless's design for me.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.text: Was expecting more of a Dbrand style sticker, but this is even better. It's super rubbery and grippy. Don't ever plan on missing a shot when you play with this!
